newsitem.title: USA: US Treasury's 3-,6-mo bills seen at 5.14, 5.30 pct.
newsitem.headline: US Treasury's 3-,6-mo bills seen at 5.14, 5.30 pct.

text.p: The U.S. Treasury's sale of $13.0 billion in three- and six-month bills on Monday is expected to produce average rates of 5.14 and 5.30 percent respectively, traders said.
In when-issued trade at about 1255 EDT/1655 GMT, three-month bill rates were quoted at 5.135 percent and six-month rates were quoted at 5.30 percent.
The bidding deadline for the auction is 1300 EDT/1700 GMT. Results are expected around 1345 EDT/1745 GMT.
